description.french: Déposer des bandages pour un autre joueur.
Déposer une trousse de soin pour un autre joueur.
Déposer des pilules pour un autre joueur.
Déposer une seringue pour un autre joueur.

description.english: Banish the Wraith back to the shadow realm.
description.french: Bannissez le Spectre dans le royaume des ombres.

description.english: Kill a Developer of the Game

description.french: Acquérir le Fusil de Chasse à Double Canon

displayName.english: Have a Pint and Wait for this to Blow Over
displayName.french: Prenez une Pinte et Attendez que ça se Calme
displayName.polish: Napijmy się i zaczekajmy, aż będzie po wszystkim

description.french: Jouer une partie en tant qu'Avery
description.turkish: Avery olarak herhangi bir oyun oyna

description.french: Jouer une partie en tant quHans
description.turkish: Hans olarak herhangi bir oyun oyna

description.french: Jouer une partie en tant que James
description.turkish: James olarak herhangi bir oyun Oyna

description.english: Play any game as the Revenant
description.french: Jouer une partie en tant que Revenant
description.turkish: Revenant olarak herhangi bir oyun oyna

displayName.french: Je Suis Trop Vieux Pour Cela...

description.french: Jouer une partie en tant que Vince
description.turkish: Vince olarak herhangi bir oyun oyna

description.english: Play any game as the Wraith
description.french: Jouer une partie en tant que Spectre
description.turkish: Hayalet olarak herhangi bir oyun oyna

description.english: Find the hidden chest and recover the bone.
description.schinese: 找到隐藏箱子并拿走骨头
description.french: Trouver le coffre caché et récupérer l'os.
description.turkish: Gizli sandığı bul ve kemiği al.
description.polish: Znajadź ukrytą skrzynię i odzyskaj kość

description.english: Hunt down and slay the wendigo.
Light the candles in the shrine.
description.french: Allumer les bougies dans le sanctuaire.

description.english: Use water to put out the fireplace.
description.french: Utiliser de l'eau pour éteindre la cheminée.

description.turkish: 10 kapı, çekmece veya sandık kilidini aç.
100 kapı, çekmece veya sandık kilidini aç.
1.000 kapı, çekmece veya sandık kilidini aç.

displayName.english: Did You Get a Little Boo Boo?
displayName.french: Vous vous êtes fait un petit bobo ?

description.french: Remporter une partie en tant quAvery
description.turkish: Avery ile herhangi bir oyun kazan.

description.french: Remporter une partie en tant quHans
description.turkish: Hans ile herhangi bir oyun kazan.

description.french: Remporter une partie en tant que James
description.turkish: James ile herhangi bir oyun kazan.

description.english: Win any game as the Revenant
description.french: Remporter une partie en tant que Revenant
description.turkish: Revenant olarak herhangi bir oyun kazan.

description.english: Win any game as the Wraith
description.french: Remporter une partie en tant que Spectre
description.turkish: Hayalet olarak herhangi bir oyun kazan.

description.polish: Jako śledczy zabij jednego ze śledczych

description.french: Remporter une partie en tant que Vince
description.turkish: Vince olarak herhangi bir oyun kazan

description.english: Kill Chrono2055, the og Dirge streamer.
description.french: Tuer Chrono2055, le streamer originel de Dirge.

description.english: You just couldn't hold it in any longer could you...
description.polish: Nie dało się już wytrzymać, co?

description.english: Stop the abominable perversion of scientific progress.
Pickup and have all the food items in your inventory in a single match.
description.turkish: Tek maçta tüm yiyecek öğelerini topla.
description.polish: Podnieś i miej w ekwipunku wszystkie rodzaje pożywienie w jednym meczu

description.english: Eat a fruit inside the crypt.
Use 10 batteries in a single match.
Use 5 pills and 3 syringes in a single match.
description.turkish: Tek bir maçta 5 hap ve 3 şırınga kullanın
description.polish: Użyj 5 tabletek i 3 strzykawek w jednym meczu

description.english: Shoot a full magazine from the Tommy Gun without letting go of the trigger.
description.turkish: Tetiği bırakmadan Tommy Gun'dan tam bir şarjör boşaltın.
description.polish: Wystrzel cały magazynek Tommy Gun bez zdejmowania palca ze spustu

displayName.english: How Many of Those Do You HAVE!

description.english: Be banished 10 times by a single player in a single match.
description.polish: Jeden gracz wypędził cię 10 razy w jednym meczu
description.turkish: Tek bir maçta tek bir oyuncu tarafından 10 kez defedil.

description.english: Acquire and fire every gun in a single match.
description.turkish: Tek bir maçta tüm silahları topla ve ateşle.
description.polish: Zdobądź każdą broń i wystrzel z niej chociaż raz w tym samym meczu

displayName.polish: To nie są nawet prawdziwe pieniądze...

description.english: Kill someone with this achievement or kill Bitcoin because you believe in fiat currency.
description.turkish: Fiat para birimine inandığınız için Bitcoin'i öldürün.
description.polish: Zabij kogoś z tym osiągnięciem albo zabij Bitcoin

description.english: Kill someone with this achievement or kill Manoleeto because you hate art.
description.turkish: Manoleeto'yu öldür, çünkü sanattan nefret ediyorsun.
description.polish: Zabij kogoś z tym osiągnięciem albo zabij Manoleeto, ponieważ nie cierpisz sztuki

description.english: Kill someone with this achievement or kill Fluffy because you don't like awesome people.
description.turkish: Fluffy'yi öldür çünkü harika insanları sevmiyorsun
description.polish: Zabij kogoś z tym osiągnięciem albo zabij Fluffy'ego, ponieważ nie lubisz świetnych ludzi

description.english: Kill a content creator, which you probably stream sniped.
description.turkish: Muhtemelen stream-snipeladığın bir içerik oluşturucusunu öldür.
description.polish: Zabij jakiegoś twórcę contentu (pewnie dzięki streamowi)

description.english: Banish the corruption of the wood.
